participant_2.background:
I wish i could spend more time at home.
I like to write my own songs.
I am a musician.
My best friend is in a band with me.
I have taken formal music lessons since i was 5.

content.text: Hi, what do you like to do for fun?
I like to write songs and play music.
Oh, that's cool! What kind of music do you write?
I write mostly indie-pop music.
Nice! What's your favorite song that you've written?
It's called "The World is Yours."
Oh, I've heard that one! It's a really good song.
Thanks! I'm glad you like it.
What's your favorite thing about being a musician?
I love the feeling of creating something new and sharing it with the world.
That makes sense. I can imagine it's a lot of fun to perform your songs for people.
It is! I love getting to see the reaction on people's faces when they hear my music.
Do you have any upcoming performances?
Not at the moment, but I'm always looking for new opportunities to play.
Well, if you ever come to my city, I'd love to come see you perform.
Thanks! I'll keep that in mind.
You're welcome. So, what else do you like to do for fun?
I like to read, watch movies, and hang out with my friends.
I like to read too. What are some of your favorite books?
I like all kinds of books, but I especially like historical fiction and fantasy novels.
Me too! I love getting lost in another world when I'm reading a book.
Me too! I think that's why I love historical fiction so much. It's so interesting to learn about other cultures and time periods.
I agree. It's also a great way to escape from the real world for a while.
Exactly! That's why I love it so much
